code: import React from"react";import PropTypes from"prop-types";import{useDispatch}from"react-redux";import BlogItem from"../BlogItem";import"./index.css";import{setEditBlog,setDeleteBlog}from"../../features/blogSlice";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function BlogList(_ref){let{blogs}=_ref;const dispatch=useDispatch();if(!blogs&&!(blogs!==null&&blogs!==void 0&&blogs.length)){return null;}const onBlogEdit=blog=>{dispatch(setEditBlog(blog));};const onBlogDelete=blog=>{dispatch(setDeleteBlog(blog));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"blog-list",children:blogs.map((blog,index)=>{return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(BlogItem,{index:index,blog:blog,imageOrientation:"top",onBlogEdit:()=>onBlogEdit(blog),onBlogDelete:()=>onBlogDelete(blog)},index);})});}BlogList.prototype={blogs:PropTypes.array.isRequired};
